CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: One can clearly observe the distinctly improved EQE values of polymers by switching the thiophene spacer from the branched 2-ethylhexyl side chain ( PIDT - EHNT ) to linear hexyl side chain ( PIDT - DTNT ) , which was further improved for the bithiophene spacer with linear dodecyl side chain attached on the optimized position ( PIDT-C12NT ) .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymers
2. Thiophene
3. Hexyl
4. Dodecyl
5. Bithiophene
6. PIDT (Polymer-based IT)
7. EHNT (2-ethylhexyl side chain)
8. DTNT (linear hexyl side chain)
9. C12NT (linear dodecyl side chain)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Thiophene
2. Bithiophene
3. PIDT-C12NT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Thiophene |
| Bithiophene |
| PIDT-C12NT |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: One can clearly observe the distinctly improved EQE values of polymers by switching the thiophene spacer from the branched 2-ethylhexyl side chain ( PIDT - EHNT ) to linear hexyl side chain ( PIDT - DTNT ) , which was further improved for the bithiophene spacer with linear dodecyl side chain attached on the optimized position ( PIDT-C12NT ) .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. EQE (Electronic Quality Factor)
2. PIDT (Polymer with Increased Doping Tendency)
3. EHNT (2-Ethylhexyl side chain)
4. DTNT (Linear dodecyl side chain)
5. C12NT (Linear dodecyl side chain attached on the optimized position)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (Electronic Quality Factor) - a material property that refers to the ability of a material to transmit or conduct electricity.
2. PIDT (Polymer with Increased Doping Tendency) - a material property that refers to the ability of a material to conduct electricity, specifically in the context of polymers.
3. C12NT (Linear dodecyl side chain) - a material property that refers to the type of side chain attached to a polymer, in this case, a linear dodecyl side chain.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE (Electronic Quality Factor) |
| PIDT (Polymer with Increased Doping Tendency) |
| C12NT (Linear dodecyl side chain) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: One can clearly observe the distinctly improved EQE values of polymers by switching the thiophene spacer from the branched 2-ethylhexyl side chain ( PIDT - EHNT ) to linear hexyl side chain ( PIDT - DTNT ) , which was further improved for the bithiophene spacer with linear dodecyl side chain attached on the optimized position ( PIDT-C12NT ) .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. EQE (Electronic Quality Factor) values
2. PIDT (Polymer Identity and Designation Tag)
3. EHNT (2-ethylhexyl side chain)
4. DTNT (dodecyl side chain)
5. C12NT (linear dodecyl side chain attached on the optimized position)

These entities represent different properties or characteristics of the polymers being studied in the paragraph, such as their electronic quality factor, polymer identity, side chains, and optimized position of attachment.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (Electronic Quality Factor) values
2. PIDT (Polymer Identity and Designation Tag)

These entities clearly refer to the value of material properties, specifically the electronic quality factor and polymer identity.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| PIDT values |
